neighbors.name: Logan Buis
neighbors.claims: Logan Buis is a resident of Putnam County and identified as the grandson of long-time Greencastle resident Doris Jean McMains ([Hopkins-Rector](https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/greencastle-in/doris-mcmains-11040902)). While the Buis Family Trust appears in county planning documents, no direct references to Logan Buis speaking on development matters were found in local government minutes as of January 2026 ([Putnam County Plan Commission](https://irp.cdn-website.com/238c8e41/files/uploaded/Plan+Commission+Minutes+June+9+2025.pdf)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private resident; no public office found

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach via informal, one-on-one outreach stressing respect for agricultural land use. Having a fellow local farmer or trusted community member introduce the development plans could help build trust.

citations.claim: Logan Buis is a resident of Putnam County and identified as the grandson of long-time Greencastle resident Doris Jean McMains
citations.title: Obituary for Doris Jean McMains

citations.claim: While the Buis Family Trust appears in county planning documents, no direct references to Logan Buis speaking on development matters were found in local government minutes as of January 2026
citations.title: Putnam County Plan Commission Minutes

neighbors.name: Mark E. Toebbe & Julie M. Toebbe
neighbors.claims: Julie M. Toebbe works as a Human Resources Manager with Pools of Fun in Plainfield, Indiana ([Growjo](https://growjo.com/company/Pools_of_Fun)). Mark and Julie Toebbe are residents of Cloverdale, Indiana, recently participating in local community memorials as of July 2025 ([Whitaker Funeral Home](https://www.whitakerfunerals.net/obituary/Larry-Grounds)). Neither Mark nor Julie Toebbe is mentioned in local public meetings regarding community development ([Putnam County Plan Commission](https://irp.cdn-website.com/238c8e41/files/uploaded/Plan+Commission+Minutes+June+9+2025.pdf)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Local residents; no public roles found

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage the Toebbes through a neighborly conversation or community open house. Emphasize how the project addresses common resident concerns like property values and traffic safety in order to earn their understanding.
